thread.section_title: Ringing in the New Year - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-
thread.title: Wave of break-ins in Burlington
thread.title_full: Wave of break-ins in Burlington - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: WCAX News
title: Wave of break-ins in Burlington
text:
BURLINGTON, Vt. - The South End of Burlington is seeing some exciting redevelopment, but lately there has been a wave of break-ins.
Police say there have been more than a dozen in just the last month. Businesses and homes have been hit, including Speeder & Earl's. Thieves have targeted the coffee shop three times over the last few months.
"Obviously we're upset about it and I think more for us there is a certain sense of violation that comes along with getting broken into like that. It's not really anything you want to walk into at six in the morning either," said Matt White, the manager of Speeder & Earl's.
Police tell WCAX News they are working on leads. In the meantime, Speeder & Earl's is installing a new security system.
